backend/main.mo: Defines game backend actor with user profiles, lobbies, match results, authorization checks, and lobby creation logic for solo and multiplayer modes.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing Solo-mode latency improvements and initialization UX updates, mapping them to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend files describing styling, routing, UI components, hooks, and game page behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with shared base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/google79d2180f87c8c2c7.h: Google site‑verification file for domain validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in a themed layout with all game pages registered.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to set a hacker alias and save their profile.
Countdown timer that computes remaining time from a start timestamp and displays urgency color changes.
Displays lobby players with host indicator in a terminal‑styled panel.
frontend/src/components/game/TerminalPan: Renders an interactive terminal UI with command history, autocomplete, and output handling for challenge commands.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and version display.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the centralized application version string.
frontend/src/content/updates.ts: Defines structured changelog entries for the Updates page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Wraps useActor to provide a simple readiness flag for actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLobbyAutoJoin.ts: Handles auto-joining multiplayer lobbies and exposes join status, errors, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for backend interactions including profiles, lobbies, matches, and command processing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a retro terminal theme with color variables and custom effects like scanlines and CRT textures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with solo and multiplayer options, lobby creation, authentication checks, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays global leaderboard and recent matches with loading states, authentication notice, and styled terminal UI.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows lobby details, handles auto-join, match start, leaving, invite copying, and polls lobby status.
frontend/src/pages/MatchPage.tsx: Runs an active match with command processing, challenge display, auto-join handling, and redirects to results on completion.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows final score and mode after a match, with options to replay or return to the main menu.
frontend/src/pages/SoloGamePage.tsx: Implements solo game flow with lobby creation, match start, resilient readiness polling, and initialization timers.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Renders a styled updates log showing version history, changes, and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/parseIcError.ts: Converts IC and backend errors into user-friendly messages, handling many specific error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/soloInitProgress.ts: Provides solo-mode initialization phases, timeout logic, and elapsed-time formatting.
frontend/src/utils/soloReadiness.ts: Supplies lobby readiness checks and retry/backoff utilities for polling readiness.
Unwraps Candid optional tuple-array values into plain values or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and safe cleanup of hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s current version, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for a browser-based hacking game. Used to track build planning, backend/frontend integration issues, and pending fixes for solo and multiplayer modes.
